page.title: 10SPARE-TIME ACTIVITIES.
page.content: {EATING OUT. POPULAR PLACES WITH THE YOUNG AND FAMILIES ARE PIZZA AND HAMBURGER RESTAURANTS e.g.MACDONALD'S AND WIMPY WHICH OFFER A VARIETY OF BURGERS, CHIPS AND MILKSHAKES. DRINKING COCKTAILS IS A FASHIONABLE PASTIME WITH SOME YOUNG PEOPLE. OLD FAVOURITES LIKE THE PUB AND FISH AND CHIP SHOP ARE STILL POPULAR. ETHNIC RESTAURANTS e.g. INDIAN AND CHINESE, ARE WELL PATRONISED. {CINEMA. TWO CINEMAS SURVIVE DESPITE THE INCREASE IN HOME VIDEO.THEY ARE WELL ATTENDED AND OFFER VARIED PROGRAMMES. {POP CULTURE YOUNG PEOPLE ENJOY WEARING CASUAL CLOTHES, COMFORTABLE AND EASY FITTING IN CLEAR BRIGHT COLOURS. THEIR FAVOURITE POP GROUP IS WHAM.
